channel.title: Java on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: Time to start the next adventure
item.description: Exciting! Finally I am ready to take the next step. I’ve sorted out the things I needed and started a business that allows me to begin my freelance work. The time has come to find my first assignment and with that, start my first adventure as digital nomad.

item.title: Logging without compromising on detail or performance
item.description: Application logging. Have you ever had to choose between detailled logging or performance? Where you on one side wanted to log something on a certain level of detail while you knew that this would have an enormous impact on the performance of your application? This is exactly the situation I was in while working on some high-load services at Twyp.
